description: This tangy, minty smoothie may have more adult appeal than kid appeal, but it’s certainly one of my favorites I particularly like it made with almond milk The pineapple in this drink will give you your daily requirement for manganese, and it’s a good source of vitamins C, B1, B6, copper and dietary fiber.
title: Pineapple Banana Mint Smoothie
title_page: Pineapple Banana Mint Smoothie Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This tangy, minty smoothie may have more adult appeal than kid appeal, but it’s certainly one of my favorites. I particularly like it made with almond milk. The pineapple in this drink will give you your daily requirement for manganese, and it’s a good source of vitamins C, B1, B6, copper and dietary fiber.
Featured in: Want More Fruit? Get Out The Blender.
